body:
In order for IRF services to be covered under the Medicare IRF benefit, submitted documentation must sufficiently demonstrate that a beneficiary’s admission to an IRF was reasonable and necessary. These resources will assist IRF providers with documentation requirements for an inpatient facility that cannot be managed in other settings. This video discusses resources that will assist providers with proper documentation of IRF care.

 

JJA – https://www.palmettogba.com/internet/PCIDN.nsf/R?OpenAgent&DID=CPNHV484&url=yes

JMA - https://www.palmettogba.com/internet/PCIDN.nsf/R?OpenAgent&DID=CPNHWH15&url=yes

 

After view the video, please provide feedback by completing this quick survey regarding your experience.
title: Inpatient Rehabilitation Facilities (IRFs): Getting it Right the First Time Video
